title: How to Make an Over The Hill Cake

steps.headline: Shape the cake.
steps.description: Spread a small amount of buttercream in the centre of the large cake. Stick the smaller cake on top. Carve round the top outside rim of both cakes to make a rough dome shape.

steps.headline: Add the buttercream.
steps.description: Spread a line of white buttercream around and over the cake, like a winding road. Add the green food coloring to the rest of the buttercream and stir in. Cover the rest of the cake with the green buttercream.

steps.headline: Add the sweets.
steps.description: Using a spoon, carefully sprinkle hundreds and thousands over the white buttercream. Press green jellybeans in a line around the base of the cake.

steps.headline: Arrange the models.
steps.description: Stick some plastic trees into the buttercream to give the hill a bit of life. Finish by positioning a model car just over the brow of the hill.

text: Shape the cake. Spread a small amount of buttercream in the centre of the large cake. Stick the smaller cake on top. Carve round the top outside rim of both cakes to make a rough dome shape. Add the buttercream. Spread a line of white buttercream around and over the cake, like a winding road. Add the green food coloring to the rest of the buttercream and stir in. Cover the rest of the cake with the green buttercream. Add the sweets. Using a spoon, carefully sprinkle hundreds and thousands over the white buttercream. Press green jellybeans in a line around the base of the cake. Arrange the models. Stick some plastic trees into the buttercream to give the hill a bit of life. Finish by positioning a model car just over the brow of the hill.
